org.zaproxy.zap.control

Class AddOnRunIssuesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOnRunIssuesUtils

  • public final class AddOnRunIssuesUtils
extends Object
    An utility/helper class that extract textual representations of running issues of add-ons and show warning messages of add-ons that can not be run.
    Since:
    2.4.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AddOnRunIssuesUtils.AddOnSearcher
      Interface to search for add-ons with a given id.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean askConfirmationAddOnNotRunnable(String message, String question, AddOnCollection availableAddOns, AddOn addOnNotRunnable)
      Shows a confirmation dialogue (yes-no question), with the given message at the top, followed by a tree in which is shown the add-on with its corresponding running issues and, at the bottom before the yes and no buttons, the given question.
      static String getDependencyIssue(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements requirements)
      Returns the textual representation of the issue that prevents the add-on or extension from being run, if any.
      static List<String> getExtensionsRunningIssues(AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements requirements)
      Returns the textual representation of the issues that prevent the extensions of the add-on from being run, if any.
      static String getJavaVersionIssue(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements requirements)
      Returns the textual representation of the Java version issue that prevents the add-on or extension from being run, if any.
      static List<String> getRunningIssues(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements requirements)
      Returns the textual representations of the running issues (Java version and dependency), if any.
      static List<String> getUiExtensionsRunningIssues(AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements requirements, AddOnRunIssuesUtils.AddOnSearcher addOnSearcher)
      Returns the textual representations of the running issues (Java version and dependency) of the extensions of hte add-on, if any.

      Returns the textual representations of the running issues (Java version and dependency), if any.

    • Method Detail

      • showWarningMessageAddOnsNotRunnable

        public static void showWarningMessageAddOnsNotRunnable(String message,
                                       AddOnCollection availableAddOns,
                                       Collection<AddOn> addOnsNotRunnable)
        Shows a warning dialogue with the add-ons and its corresponding running issues or the issues if is extensions.

        The dialogue is composed with the given message and a tree in which are shown the add-ons and its issues as child nodes of the add-ons.

        Parameters:
        message - the main message shown in the dialogue
        availableAddOns - the add-ons that are available, used to create and check the running issues
        addOnsNotRunnable - the add-ons with running issues that will be shown in the tree

      • askConfirmationAddOnNotRunnable

        public static boolean askConfirmationAddOnNotRunnable(String message,
                                      String question,
                                      AddOnCollection availableAddOns,
                                      AddOn addOnNotRunnable)
        Shows a confirmation dialogue (yes-no question), with the given message at the top, followed by a tree in which is shown the add-on with its corresponding running issues and, at the bottom before the yes and no buttons, the given question.
        Parameters:
        message - the main message shown in the dialogue
        question - the questions shown at the bottom of the dialogue, before the buttons
        availableAddOns - the add-ons that are available, used to create check the running issues
        addOnNotRunnable - the add-on with running issues that will be shown in the tree
        Returns:
        true if it is confirmed, false otherwise

      • getUiRunningIssues

        public static List<String> getUiRunningIssues(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements requirements,
                              AddOnRunIssuesUtils.AddOnSearcher addOnSearcher)
        Returns the textual representations of the running issues (Java version and dependency), if any.

        The messages are internationalised thus suitable for UI components.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the run requirements of the add-on
        addOnSearcher - the class responsible for searching add-ons with a given id, used to search for add-ons that are missing for the add-on
        Returns:
        a List containing all the running issues of the add-on, empty if none
        See Also:
        getRunningIssues(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements), getUiExtensionsRunningIssues(AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements, AddOnSearcher)

      • getUiExtensionsRunningIssues

        public static List<String> getUiExtensionsRunningIssues(AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements requirements,
                                        AddOnRunIssuesUtils.AddOnSearcher addOnSearcher)
        Returns the textual representations of the running issues (Java version and dependency) of the extensions of hte add-on, if any.

        The messages are internationalised thus suitable for UI components.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the run requirements of the add-on, whose extensions' run requirements will be used
        addOnSearcher - the class responsible for searching add-ons with a given id, used to search for add-ons that are missing for the add-on
        Returns:
        a List containing all the running issues of the add-on, empty if none
        See Also:
        getRunningIssues(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements), getUiExtensionsRunningIssues(AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements, AddOnSearcher)

      • getRunningIssues

        public static List<String> getRunningIssues(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements requirements)
        Returns the textual representations of the running issues (Java version and dependency), if any.

        The messages are not internationalised, should be used only for logging and non UI uses.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the run requirements of the add-on or extension
        Returns:
        a List containing all the running issues of the add-on or extension, empty if none
        See Also:
        getUiRunningIssues(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements, AddOnSearcher), getUiExtensionsRunningIssues(AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements, AddOnSearcher)

      • getExtensionsRunningIssues

        public static List<String> getExtensionsRunningIssues(AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements requirements)
        Returns the textual representation of the issues that prevent the extensions of the add-on from being run, if any.

        The messages are not internationalised, should be used only for logging and non UI uses.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the run requirements of the add-on whose extensions' run requirements will be used
        Returns:
        a String representing the running issue, null if none.
        See Also:
        AddOn.AddOnRunRequirements.getExtensionRequirements()

      • getJavaVersionIssue

        public static String getJavaVersionIssue(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements requirements)
        Returns the textual representation of the Java version issue that prevents the add-on or extension from being run, if any.

        The message is not internationalised, should be used only for logging and non UI uses.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the run requirements of the add-on or extension
        Returns:
        a String representing the running issue, null if none.

      • getDependencyIssue

        public static String getDependencyIssue(AddOn.BaseRunRequirements requirements)
        Returns the textual representation of the issue that prevents the add-on or extension from being run, if any.

        The messages are not internationalised, should be used only for logging and non UI uses.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the run requirements of the add-on or extension
        Returns:
        a String representing the running issue, null if none.
